title: My Pixel 2 cycles during charging. It charges for a few seconds, stops for a few seconds, repeat
content: The C to C cable stopped working a while ago.  I bought a new wall wart and cable from you, to no avail.  I'm now using the USB to C cable plugged into my laptop to charge the phone.   I've tried rebooting.   It's annoying because the bling sound occurs each time the phone starts charging again.
